description: Passbolt is a free and open source password manager designed for collaboration. With Passbolt you can securely generate, store, manage and monitor your team credentials. Get access to all of your logins and passwords from multiple browsers or even your mobile phone.

env.description: Enter your time zone here. See examples https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones
env.label: TZ
env.name: TZ

env.description: Enter your MySql root password here
env.label: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
env.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD

env.description: Enter your Passbolt database name here
env.label: MYSQL_DATABASE
env.name: MYSQL_DATABASE

env.description: Enter your Passbolt database user here
env.label: MYSQL_USER
env.name: MYSQL_USER

env.description: Enter your Passbolt database password here
env.label: MYSQL_PASSWORD
env.name: MYSQL_PASSWORD

env.description: Enter your Passbolt https port here
env.label: PASSBOLT_PORT
env.name: PASSBOLT_PORT

env.description: Enter your full Passbolt https base URL here. Including port if different from 443
env.label: PASSBOLT_URL
env.name: PASSBOLT_URL

env.description: Enter your email smtp server here
env.label: EMAIL_SMTP_SERVER
env.name: EMAIL_SMTP_SERVER

env.description: Enter your email smtp port here
env.label: EMAIL_SMTP_PORT
env.name: EMAIL_SMTP_PORT

name: Passbolt
title: Passbolt
